roleset.name: to name, naming, ceremonially
roleset.note: CHRISTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'christen' based on ebn instances. (from christen.01-v predicate notes)
CHRISTENING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'christen.01'. Correponds to VNcls dub-29.3. (from christening.01-n)

example.name: name
example.text: [The destroyer]-1 was christened *-1 there five years ago.

example.name: All args
example.text: Their appreciation of his ability as a baseball player led to their christening him "The Only Del."

example.name: just arg1. Ships.
example.text: Special occasions such as keel laying , ship christening , and commissioning ceremonies deal with shipbuilding , no ceremonies for scrapping .
